title: 保持我的房间干净

conversations.english: Lisa, are there family rules in this house?丽莎，这个家有家规吗？
conversations.chinese: 丽莎，这个家有家规吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I wouldn't call them rules, but there are some things that I expect my daughter to do.嗯，我不会称它们为规定，但是有些事是我希望我女儿做的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我不会称它们为规定，但是有些事是我希望我女儿做的。

title: 周六的早晨 Saturday morning

conversations.english: Why are you up so early, Mary?玛丽，你怎么起得这么早？
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，你怎么起得这么早？
conversations.reply_english: I'm still suffering from a little jetlag.我还有一点点时差没有调整过来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我还有一点点时差没有调整过来。

title: 我们马上就要放寒假了

conversations.english: The new year is coming. Is the final examination approaching.新的一年即将到来。期末考试也临近了。
conversations.chinese: 新的一年即将到来。期末考试也临近了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, yeah. We will have winter holiday.是的，妈妈。我们就要放寒假了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，妈妈。我们就要放寒假了。

title: 你的钻石戒指丢了?

conversations.english: What? Your diamond ring is lost?什么？你的钻石戒指丢了？
conversations.chinese: 什么？你的钻石戒指丢了？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I just cannot find it anywhere.是的，我哪儿都找不到它。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我哪儿都找不到它。

title: 他们还是孩子

conversations.english: Don’t be angry with them. After all, they are still children.不要生他们的气了.毕竟他们还是孩子。
conversations.chinese: 不要生他们的气了.毕竟他们还是孩子。
conversations.reply_english: But I am still worry about them. I’m afraid...但是我仍然担心他们，我怕......
conversations.reply_chinese: 但是我仍然担心他们，我怕......

title: 我要去中国旅游

conversations.english: I want to go to china for sight-seeing.What do you think of it,Mum?妈妈,我要去中国旅游,你觉得怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 妈妈,我要去中国旅游,你觉得怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Why not?China is a wonderful country.行，中国是个很不错的国家。
conversations.reply_chinese: 行，中国是个很不错的国家。

title: 乔迁之喜聚会

conversations.english: Susan, I am inviting you and Frank to our house warming party this weekend.苏珊，我邀请你和弗兰克这个周末来参加我们家的乔迁之喜聚会。
conversations.chinese: 苏珊，我邀请你和弗兰克这个周末来参加我们家的乔迁之喜聚会。
conversations.reply_english: A house warming party?乔迁之喜聚会？
conversations.reply_chinese: 乔迁之喜聚会？

title: 我们上个星期刚打扫过的

conversations.english: It's Sunday today.今天是星期天。
conversations.chinese: 今天是星期天。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I know.是的，我知道。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我知道。

title: 你能来帮我洗洗碗吗

conversations.english: Can you give me a hand with the dishes?你能帮我洗碗吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能帮我洗碗吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Should I wash or dry?当然。我应该洗还是应该擦干？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。我应该洗还是应该擦干？

title: 我得赶紧把家务做完 Get the chores done

conversations.english: Grand Theft Auto Three is awesome!《侠盗猎车手3》真赞！
conversations.chinese: 《侠盗猎车手3》真赞！
conversations.reply_english: It's more violent than TV news!真是比电视新闻还暴力啊！
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是比电视新闻还暴力啊！

title: 你能帮我熨烫一下衬衫吗 Ironing

conversations.english: My shirt needs ironing. Could you please help me with that, Mary?我的衬衫需要熨一下。你能帮个忙吗，玛丽？
conversations.chinese: 我的衬衫需要熨一下。你能帮个忙吗，玛丽？
conversations.reply_english: No way. Do it yourself.不行。你自己干吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不行。你自己干吧。

title: 我马上就把这些盘子洗净

conversations.english: You shouldn't let the dirty dishes accumulate in the sink!你不应该把脏盘子堆积在哪里。
conversations.chinese: 你不应该把脏盘子堆积在哪里。
conversations.reply_english: I know, I should wash them right away.知道了，我必须马上去洗掉它们。
conversations.reply_chinese: 知道了，我必须马上去洗掉它们。

title: 我们一定要拆掉这棵圣诞树吗

conversations.english: Ok, honey, time to take down the Christmas tree.行了，亲爱的，该拿走圣诞树上的东西了。
conversations.chinese: 行了，亲爱的，该拿走圣诞树上的东西了。
conversations.reply_english: Do we have to?必须拿下吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 必须拿下吗？

title: 你要被罚负责所有的做家务

conversations.english: Johnny, I can't believe you would do that.强尼，我不敢相信你会做这种事。
conversations.chinese: 强尼，我不敢相信你会做这种事。
conversations.reply_english: I know, Grandma, I just...我知道，奶奶，我只是……
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道，奶奶，我只是……

title: 你也知道你奶奶最讨厌脏乱

conversations.english: Johnny, have you tidied up your room yet?强尼，你的房间整理好没？
conversations.chinese: 强尼，你的房间整理好没？
conversations.reply_english: Not yet, Mom. Why are you on such a cleanliness kick anyway?还没，妈。你干嘛这么狂扫地啊？
conversations.reply_chinese: 还没，妈。你干嘛这么狂扫地啊？

title: 你就是一个洁癖怪人 A neat freak

conversations.english: Ugg, this bathroom is a pigsty!呃，浴室简直就是一猪圈啦！
conversations.chinese: 呃，浴室简直就是一猪圈啦！
conversations.reply_english: Helen, why do you keep flushing the toilet? What's wrong?海伦，为什么你一直在冲洗厕所，出什么事了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 海伦，为什么你一直在冲洗厕所，出什么事了吗？

title: 现在该你洗盘子了

conversations.english: I have been washing the dishes for over a week now.我洗盘子都有一周多了。
conversations.chinese: 我洗盘子都有一周多了。
conversations.reply_english: Well, I think you are very good at doing the dishes, so maybe you should do them for another week.哦，我觉得你洗盘子洗得很好，所以或许该多洗一周。
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，我觉得你洗盘子洗得很好，所以或许该多洗一周。

title: 我尽力了I'm doing my best

conversations.english: Johnny, are you just sitting around again?强尼，你又在那边摸鱼是不是啊？
conversations.chinese: 强尼，你又在那边摸鱼是不是啊？
conversations.reply_english: I'm just taking a break between washing the windows and cleaning the toilet.我刚刚洗完窗户，等一下要洗马桶，我只是中间休息一下。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我刚刚洗完窗户，等一下要洗马桶，我只是中间休息一下。

title: 大扫除 House Cleaning

conversations.english: Mama, shall I put all of the old things in the box?妈妈，这些旧东西都放到这盒子里吗？
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，这些旧东西都放到这盒子里吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not all things are useful. It's up to you. If you think it isn't of much use, you may throw them out.有些东西已经没用了。你决定吧，如果觉得没多大用，就扔了吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有些东西已经没用了。你决定吧，如果觉得没多大用，就扔了吧。

title: 投币洗衣机坏掉了 Coin-operated Washer

conversations.english: Dad, something wrong with our washing machine and a lot of clothes need to be wash. What should I do about it?爸爸，我们的洗衣机坏了，好多衣服要洗呢。怎么办呢？
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，我们的洗衣机坏了，好多衣服要洗呢。怎么办呢？
conversations.reply_english: Ur, I am busy with my work. There is a coin-operated washing machine on the first floor. Let’s go.恩，我在忙我的工作呢。一楼有一个投币洗衣机，我们去吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩，我在忙我的工作呢。一楼有一个投币洗衣机，我们去吧。

title: 我有三件衣物需要干洗 Dry-cleaning

conversations.english: What can I do for you?能为你做点什么？
conversations.chinese: 能为你做点什么？
conversations.reply_english: I've got a suit, a woolen sweater and a white shirt to wash.我有一套西服、一件羊毛衫和一件白色衬衣要洗。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我有一套西服、一件羊毛衫和一件白色衬衣要洗。

title: 我来取干洗和送来熨烫的衣物

conversations.english: Hi, I come to pick up my laundry. This is the invoice.你好，我来取我的衣服，这是发票。
conversations.chinese: 你好，我来取我的衣服，这是发票。
conversations.reply_english: Here you are. We've ironed them for you already. Please check and see if there is any damage.这些是您的。我们已经熨烫过了。请检查一下看是否有损坏。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些是您的。我们已经熨烫过了。请检查一下看是否有损坏。

title: 也许你该雇个保姆来帮你 Nanny

conversations.english: Hey Mel! Are you up for some tennis today?你好，Mel。你今天有空打网球吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，Mel。你今天有空打网球吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sorry, I can’t! I have to go to work, pick up Jake and Maddie from school, and make them an afternoon snack, then take Jake to soccer practice and Maddie to dance class.对不起，我去不了，我得去干活，去学校接Jake和Maddie。并给他们做午饭，然后带Jake去进行足球训练，送Maddie去舞蹈班。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，我去不了，我得去干活，去学校接Jake和Maddie。并给他们做午饭，然后带Jake去进行足球训练，送Maddie去舞蹈班。

title: 我真的吃不下了 Can't eat anymore

conversations.english: You have to finish your dinner before you leave the table.你离开饭桌之前必须把饭吃完。
conversations.chinese: 你离开饭桌之前必须把饭吃完。
conversations.reply_english: But, Mom, I can't eat anymore. I'm stuffed.可是妈，我吃不下了，我饱了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 可是妈，我吃不下了，我饱了。

title: 你不能和朋友在外过夜 Out of the question

conversations.english: Can I stay out all night with my friends?我可以跟我的朋友整晚在外吗？
conversations.chinese: 我可以跟我的朋友整晚在外吗？
conversations.reply_english: No way.不行。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不行。

title: 你们国家的小孩一般都几岁上学

conversations.english: When do most children start school in your country?你们国家的小孩一般都几岁上学?
conversations.chinese: 你们国家的小孩一般都几岁上学?
conversations.reply_english: In America, most children start primary school at the age of five.在美国,小孩通常都是5岁上小学.
conversations.reply_chinese: 在美国,小孩通常都是5岁上小学.

title: 遇到紧急情况就要拨打电话911

conversations.english: Alright class, now that we’re all dressed up let’s see what professions you chose. Ah, I see a fireman, a police officer, a medic, and a lifeguard! Can anyone tell me what these people have in common?好了，同学们，现在我们都已经化妆了，来看看你们都选了什么职业。我看见有消防员，警察，医生和保镖。谁能告诉我这些职业有什么共性吗？
conversations.chinese: 好了，同学们，现在我们都已经化妆了，来看看你们都选了什么职业。我看见有消防员，警察，医生和保镖。谁能告诉我这些职业有什么共性吗？
conversations.reply_english: They save people from bad things?他们都将人们从困境中就出来？
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们都将人们从困境中就出来？

title: 他毕业后应该去上大学 Go to college

conversations.english: I'm looking forward to our son's graduation this weekend.我盼着这个周末儿子毕业呢。
conversations.chinese: 我盼着这个周末儿子毕业呢。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. So am I. But what will he do after graduation? He really needs to go to college.我也是。不过他毕业后做什么呢？他需要上大学。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也是。不过他毕业后做什么呢？他需要上大学。

title: 我现在就得起床吗 Get up now

conversations.english: Hey, Jim. Wake up!嘿，吉姆。起床啦！
conversations.chinese: 嘿，吉姆。起床啦！
conversations.reply_english: Do I have to get up now?我现在就要起床吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我现在就要起床吗？

title: 我建议你对待孩子再耐心点儿

conversations.english: I don’t want you to be worried, but our son has some bad habits now. He says painful words everyday.我不想让你担心，但是我们的儿子现在有些坏习惯了。他每天都说些伤人的话。
conversations.chinese: 我不想让你担心，但是我们的儿子现在有些坏习惯了。他每天都说些伤人的话。
conversations.reply_english: What words? Can you tell me?什么话？你能告诉我吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么话？你能告诉我吗？

title: 你比规定的时间晚了两个小时回家

conversations.english: Do you know what time it is?你知道现在是几点吗？
conversations.chinese: 你知道现在是几点吗？
conversations.reply_english: Um. Ten?嗯，十点？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，十点？

title: 我急需一名临时保姆 Babysitter

conversations.english: Listen, Karen, I need your help. I don't know anyone here yet.听着,凯伦，我需要你的帮忙。在这里我还不认识人。
conversations.chinese: 听着,凯伦，我需要你的帮忙。在这里我还不认识人。
conversations.reply_english: I'm glad to help you. What's wrong?我很乐意帮你，怎么了？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很乐意帮你，怎么了？

title: 我要一个人生活就得学会独立 Independent

conversations.english: Mom, I want to move out.妈妈，我想搬出去住。
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，我想搬出去住。
conversations.reply_english: Hey, sounds great to me, kid. What kind of job did you find?嘿，听起来到很不错，孩子，你找到了什么工作？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，听起来到很不错，孩子，你找到了什么工作？

title: 圣诞节你们准备得怎么样了

conversations.english: So how’s everything going for Christmas?圣诞节准备得怎么样了？
conversations.chinese: 圣诞节准备得怎么样了？
conversations.reply_english: I’ve got all the presents I need, and my family is working together to get all the food ready. That’s easy; but I have another problem to deal with.要的礼物我都准备好了，而且我们全家正在一起准备食物。那很容易，但我还有一个难题要处理。
conversations.reply_chinese: 要的礼物我都准备好了，而且我们全家正在一起准备食物。那很容易，但我还有一个难题要处理。

title: 有时候我忍不住打他的屁股

conversations.english: Paul, you were also a parent of young kids before. So, can you tell me what you did when your kids didn’t behave very well?鲍尔，你以前也是孩子的父亲。那么，你能告诉我你的小孩捣乱时你是怎么做的吗？
conversations.chinese: 鲍尔，你以前也是孩子的父亲。那么，你能告诉我你的小孩捣乱时你是怎么做的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I know Mark is your only child. You may do it differently from what I did. Sometimes I would tap their hands when they made troubles.我知道马克是你唯一的小孩。你可能和我当初做的不一样。当他们惹祸时，有时候我会轻拍他们的手。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道马克是你唯一的小孩。你可能和我当初做的不一样。当他们惹祸时，有时候我会轻拍他们的手。

title: 你儿子又惹麻烦了 Trouble

conversations.english: I just got a call from Mrs. Fitzgerald. See what your Willie has just done.我刚接到菲茨格尔德太太的电话。看看你的威利刚刚做了些什么。
conversations.chinese: 我刚接到菲茨格尔德太太的电话。看看你的威利刚刚做了些什么。
conversations.reply_english: My Willie? Why has he suddenly become my Willie?我的威利？怎么又突然变成了我的威利？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的威利？怎么又突然变成了我的威利？

title: 你该吃些更有营养的食物

conversations.english: Mum,pass me some more please!妈妈，请再给我一点。
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，请再给我一点。
conversations.reply_english: Tina,you should have more nutritious food.Don't eat these crisps any more.蒂娜，你该吃些更有营养的食物，别总吃这些炸土豆片了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 蒂娜，你该吃些更有营养的食物，别总吃这些炸土豆片了。

title: 不回家过夜至少也要打个电话

conversations.english: Staying out all night,you frightened me to death.你整夜不回家，真是把我吓死了。
conversations.chinese: 你整夜不回家，真是把我吓死了。
conversations.reply_english: I stayed with my friends.我和朋友们在一起了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我和朋友们在一起了。

title: 生病了就该多泡热澡

conversations.english: Ouch! The water's too hot!哎唷！水太烫了啦！
conversations.chinese: 哎唷！水太烫了啦！
conversations.reply_english: Get in slowly, sweetie. You'll get used to it. I'm gonna go and make you some chicken soup.亲爱的，慢慢泡进去。你会习惯这个温度的。我去帮你煮些鸡汤。
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，慢慢泡进去。你会习惯这个温度的。我去帮你煮些鸡汤。

title: 试着捏住鼻子把药喝下去

conversations.english: I'm done. Can I watch TV?我泡好了。可以看电视吗？
conversations.chinese: 我泡好了。可以看电视吗？
conversations.reply_english: Here's some water. Take these multi-vitamins and Tylenol.这里有一杯水。把这些综合维他命和退烧药吃下去。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这里有一杯水。把这些综合维他命和退烧药吃下去。

title: 我讨厌你 You're such a drag

conversations.english: Come to think of it, you should get out your English books and catch up on your reading assignments.说起这个让我想到，你该去把英文课本拿出来，把阅读作业看完。
conversations.chinese: 说起这个让我想到，你该去把英文课本拿出来，把阅读作业看完。
conversations.reply_english: But I don't have any reading assignments.但我根本没有阅读作业。
conversations.reply_chinese: 但我根本没有阅读作业。

title: 擤鼻涕能让喉咙好快点 Blow my nose

conversations.english: Great. My favorite-soup, soup, soup...太好了。我最喜欢的就是——汤、汤、汤……
conversations.chinese: 太好了。我最喜欢的就是——汤、汤、汤……
conversations.reply_english: Oh, and there's one more thing you have to do every hour on the hour, sweets.喔，还有你每小时的整点，都要准时再做一件事，亲爱的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 喔，还有你每小时的整点，都要准时再做一件事，亲爱的。

title: 我受够生病的滋味了 Sick of being sick

conversations.english: Mom, I'm ready for school.妈，我准备好去上学了。
conversations.chinese: 妈，我准备好去上学了。
conversations.reply_english: Let me feel your forehead. I'm so glad it wasn't strep throat.让我摸摸你的额头。幸好这次不是链球菌感染。
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我摸摸你的额头。幸好这次不是链球菌感染。

title: 那些餐盘和马克杯都哪去了
